price: "Kuma lalle Allah ne Ubangijina* kuma Ubangijinku, sai ku bauta Masa. Wannan shi ne tafarki madaidaici."
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
footnotes: * Tana a cikin maganar Ĩsã a lõkacin da ya girma yana wa'azi ga mutãnensa, sabõda haka aka raba ta da maganar farko a lõkacin da yake jãrĩri.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna al-laha rabbī warabbukum fa-uʿ'budūhu hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
